model
Class Model

java.lang.Object
  model.Model

public class Model
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides interface of model. Contains two internal states: 1) First (the first Player hits), 2) Second (the second Player hits).

Version:
May 3, 2009 model
Author:
Adam Dziedzic grupa: K1I1

hit

public boolean hit(MyPoint point)
Implements an action of hit, which depends on the state of model. (Player who hits.)

Parameters:
Point - point in which plater hit
Returns:
boolean Return true if operation executed, return false in another case (field has arleady been hit).

changePlayer

public void changePlayer()
Change a player who hits. (Zmienia gracza, ktory strzela.) (It is executed in hit() method in PlayerState, so it should not be used in controller. )
